CompactMode.description: If true portions of the interface are styled in a compact style.

FontSize.description: Optionally sets the font size for certain elements of the UI.

RememberTabs.description: When starting VMPlex will remember and reopen previously opened tabs.

ConfirmToolBarActions.description: When true certain tool bar actions will prompt for confirmation. Like rebooting, shutting down, and resetting virtual machines.

Debugger.description: Defines the debugger to use when launching one for a given virtual machine.

items.description: User settings for a given virtual machine.

Guid.description: The GUID of the virtual machine as reported by Hyper-V.

Name.description: The friendly name of the virtual machine as reported by Hyper-V.

DebuggerArguments.description: Arguments passed to the debugger when launching one for this virtual machine.

OnTabOpen.description: Specifies the action to take when opening the virtual machine tab.

OnTabClose.description: Specifies the action to take when closing the virtual machine tab.

OnApplicationStart.description: Specifies the action to take when VMPlex starts.

OnApplicationExit.description: Specifies the action to take when VMPlex exits.

TabIndex.description: Indicates if the virtual machine tab is open and at what index. Used in conjunction with RememberTabs.

RdpConnections.description: A list of remote desktop connection settings for connecting to machines that aren't Hyper-V managed virtual machines.

RdpSettings.description: Optional RDP settings used when connecting to this virtual machine.

Domain.description: The domain to use when connecting, ignored for virtual machines.

Server.description: The the server to connect to, ignored for virtual machines.

DefaultEnhancedSession.description: The default enhanced session state when connecting.

RedirectClipboard.description: Specifies if redirection of the clipboard is allowed.

AudioCaptureRedirectionMode.description: Specifies if the default audio input device is captured.

RedirectDrives.description: Specifies if redirection of disk drives is allowed.

RedirectDevices.description: Specifies if redirection of devices is allowed.

RedirectSmartCards.description: Specifies if redirection of smart cards is allowed.

DesktopWidth.description: Specifies the initial remote desktop width, in pixels.

DesktopHeight.description: Specifies the initial remote desktop height, in pixels.
